str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Second; with the article: in the second place, for the second time. As the compare of duo; second.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From kata and leipo; to leave down, i.e. Behind; by implication, to abandon, have remaining.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
From speiro; something sown, i.e. Seed; by implication, offspring; specially, a remnant.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Third. Ordinal from treis; third; neuter a third part, or a third time, thirdly.
In like manner, likewise, just so. From hos and an adverb from autos; as thus, i.e. In the same way.
